author: cms-sw
body: with `SCRAMV3` , once can run `scram tool tag <toolname> TOOLVERSION` to get the version of the tool but this feature does not work for old SCRAMV2. https://github.com/cms-sw/SCRAM/commit/158cdbe2c93768caf002fdb06e9c51ce6c5c1b56 enable this for old `SCRAMV2` releases.
title: SCRAMV2: Allow to query TOOLVERSION
